@@ -33,0 +33,1 @@ +import java.nio.ByteBuffer; @@ -76,3 +77,8 @@ - * attempt to release resources associated with it. Examples of resources associated with the global scope are - * {@linkplain MemorySegment#ofArray(int[]) heap segments} and variable arity lists - * {@linkplain VaList#ofAddress(MemoryAddress, ResourceScope) obtained} from raw memory addresses. + * attempt to release resources associated with it. Examples of resources associated with the global scope are: + *
    + *
  • heap segments created from {@linkplain MemorySegment#ofArray(int[]) arrays} or + * {@linkplain MemorySegment#ofByteBuffer(ByteBuffer) buffers};
    • + *
  • variable arity lists {@linkplain VaList#ofAddress(MemoryAddress, ResourceScope) obtained} from raw memory addresses; + *
  • native symbols {@linkplain SymbolLookup#lookup(String) obtained} from a {@linkplain SymbolLookup#loaderLookup() loader lookup}, + * or from the {@link CLinker}.
    • + *
